name: @sounds.of.limbo/extensions
description: Useful extensions for basic JS prototypes

scripts.build: npm test && rm -rf dist && npx tsc
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.pub_n_go: npm publish && git add . && git commit -m "Version $(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"') published" && git push && git tag "v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')" && npm push --tags

author: Limbo Sounds
